price: Şübhəsiz ki, kafir olanları, (insanları) Allah yolundan azdıranları, sonra da kafir olaraq ölənləri, Allah bağışlamayacaqdır.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ مَاتُواْ وَهُمۡ كُفَّارٞ فَلَن يَغۡفِرَ ٱللَّهُ لَهُمۡ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna kafarū waṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi thumma mātū wahum kuffārun falan yaghfira al-lahu lahum
